name: Space, s2pd!
description:
An old fashioned arcade style space battle!

Made as part of an experiment while building my own JavaScript game engine 👉 https://github.com/HatAndBread/s2pd

❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
